title: designer specializing in custom handwritten fonts
content: Hello - My client is interested in having a handwritten font created. Does anyone have any recommendations on finding a designer who has expertise in this area? Thanks in advance!
author: amills

comments.content:
Fellow typophile [Nick Cooke](http://web.archive.org/web/20150425083049/http:/www.g-type.com/fonts) has done some wonderful scripts (Olicana, Rollerscript).

Also [Jeroen »Joebob« van der Ham](http://web.archive.org/web/20150425083049/http:/www.joebob.nl/) has done some nice scripts.

I have some experience in this area.  
What’s the budget?
